description: Describe VPC Block Public Access (BPA) options. VPC Block Public Access (BPA) enables you to block resources in VPCs and subnets that you own in a Region from reaching or being reached from the internet through internet gateways and egress-only internet gateways. To learn more about VPC BPA, see Block public access to VPCs and subnets in the Amazon VPC User Guide.

nested_items.name: AwsAccountId
nested_items.description: An Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of VPC BPA.

nested_items.name: InternetGatewayBlockMode
nested_items.description: The current mode of VPC BPA.
off: VPC BPA is not enabled and traffic is allowed to and from internet gateways and egress-only internet gateways in this Region.

nested_items.type: except for excluded VPCs and subnets
nested_items.description: block-bidirectional: Block all traffic to and from internet gateways and egress-only internet gateways in this Region (except for excluded VPCs and subnets).

nested_items.type: except for VPCs or subnets which are excluded
nested_items.description: block-ingress: Block all internet traffic to the VPCs in this Region (except for VPCs or subnets which are excluded). Only traffic to and from NAT gateways and egress-only internet gateways is allowed because these gateways only allow outbound connections to be established.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The reason for the current state.

nested_items.name: LastUpdateTimestamp
nested_items.description: The last time the VPC BPA mode was updated.

nested_items.name: ManagedBy
nested_items.description: The entity that manages the state of VPC BPA. Possible values include:
account - The state is managed by the account.
declarative-policy - The state is managed by a declarative policy and can't be modified by the account.

nested_items.name: ExclusionsAllowed
nested_items.description: Determines if exclusions are allowed. If you have enabled VPC BPA at the Organization level, exclusions may be not-allowed. Otherwise, they are allowed.
